place_of_publication.publication_title: in H. G. A. Engler and K. Prantl, Nat. Pflanzenfam.

bio:treatment.description: Plants to 12 cm. Stems hooked at apices. Stem leaves 1.2–2.2 mm wide; alar cells shorter, wider than basal cells, 18–38 × 12–25 µm; medial laminal cells 40–90 × 5–9 µm. Branch leaves 2.2–4 × 0.9–1.3 mm. Seta 1.7–3 cm. Capsule arcuate when dry, ellipsoid when moist, 2–3.4 mm.
